# Workflow {#wf}

The recommended workflow for coding projects in DASD is:

Create/clone [github repo](#versioncontrol)  
Create [issue](#versioncontrol)  
Create [branch](#versioncontrol)  
Set up [dependency management](#projdep)  
Build in [unit testing](#unittest)  
Commit [changes](#versioncontrol)  
[Pull request/QA](#review)
